label: Great Britain
title: StopPay
desc: Direct links to cancel your subscriptions
seo_text:
How to cancel a subscription?

StopPay helps you stop automatic charges from your card. Here you will find direct links to cancel subscriptions for Apple, Google Play, Netflix, Hulu, and other services. Don't let services charge you for what you don't use.

ui.feedback_desc: Tell us the name, and we will add it.
